snippet.title: Half-Life 2 RTX - An RTX Remix Project Trailer | CES 2024
snippet.description: Take a new look at Half-Life 2 RTX: An RTX Remix Project, created by the community with Nvidia's modding platform. Behind the remaster is Orbifold Studios, made up of four of Half-Life 2’s best mod teams.
